lead_paragraph: FIFA presidential candidate Gianni Infantino will round off his election campaign with a visit to Robben Island, the former apartheid-era prison in South Africa, a source close to the Swiss's campaign told Reuters on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Infantino to Visit Robben Island in FIFA Campaign Finale
headline.main: Infantino to Visit Robben Island in FIFA Campaign Finale

snippet: FIFA presidential candidate Gianni Infantino will round off his election campaign with a visit to Robben Island, the former apartheid-era prison in South Africa, a source close to the Swiss's campaign told Reuters on Sunday....
